award-group.funding-source: Frankfurt Zoological Society–Help for Threatened Wildlife

funding-group.funding-statement: This work was supported by the conservation projects INNOVA-CORFO and CEQUA, [PNBO/2009]; Frankfurt Zoological Society–Help for Threatened Wildlife [1171/93]. C. Riquelme and P. Corti were funded by CONICYT-PAI [7910012016] granted to P. Corti and FONDECYT [3110187]. S.A. Estay was funded by CAPES-CONICYT [FB-002 (line 4)] and FONDECYT [1160370]. The funders had no role in study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript.
